comments.author: Dave
comments.body: You weren't entirely alone out there today, Steve-O. JG and I did the McClintock loop, keeping you company in spirit at least. We didn't see a soul on the trail, and on this, one of the most beautiful days of the year! I know what you mean about being glad to live in Boulder. Just think of the poor saps in Denver who ride around and around and around Wash Park on their lunch breaks. Holy cow.

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: i think steve needs to check out http://glazeddoughnut.us/sanity/index.php. Dennis

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: I'm only about 80% insane, thank you very much! Fully qualified to work in the CTO's office.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: That list of stuff on the insanity check... they meant all in one day, right? Then I think I'm okay. Mostly.
